description: This file demonstrates the usage of AzureOpenAIEmbedder and PgVector classes to generate text embeddings and initialize an agent knowledge base with a vector database.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents the agent's knowledge base, integrating a vector database.

classes.name: AzureOpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Handles creation of text embeddings using Azure OpenAI services.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Represents a PostgreSQL-based vector database for storing embeddings.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text input.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the AgentKnowledge and PgVector instances with configuration parameters.
